text: Brent Kinsman and Shane Kinsman (Los Angeles, California, November 13, 1997) are American twin child actors who typically portray rambunctious twins, most notably, as Kyle and Nigel Baker in the 2003 film Cheaper by the Dozen and its 2005 sequel Cheaper by the Dozen 2. They also had featured roles as Porter and Preston Scavo on the popular ABC television series Desperate Housewives for four years (replaced by Charlie Carver and Max Carver from season 5). ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2003||Cheaper by the Dozen||Kyle and Nigel Baker|| |- |2004–2008||Desperate Housewives||Porter and Preston Scavo || |- |2005||Cheaper by the Dozen 2||Kyle and Nigel Baker|| |- |2008 || ER || Curly and Larry Weddington||Episode: "The Book of Abby" |- |} ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="5" |Awards |- ! align="center"| Year ! width="50"| Result ! width="150"| Award ! width="425"| Category ! width="200"| Nominated Work |- | 2004 | |Young Artist Awards | Best Young Ensemble in a Feature Film | Cheaper by the Dozen |- |rowspan=2|2006 | | Young Artist Awards | Best Young Ensemble in a Feature Film | Cheaper by the Dozen 2 |- | | Screen Actors Guild Awards | Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a TV Series |rowspan=4| Desperate Housewives |- | 2007 | | Screen Actors Guild Awards | Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a TV Series |- | 2008 | | Screen Actors Guild Awards | Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a TV Series |- | 2009 | | Screen Actors Guild Awards | Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a TV Series |} ==References== ==External links== * *Get Desperate! - Shane Kinsman People Guide entry & news listings Category:Male actors from Los Angeles Category:American male child actors Category:American male film actors Category:American male television actors Category:Identical twin male actors Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Twin people from the United States Category:American male identical twin child actors
